channel.title: Heroes of Might and Magic VI eats my CPU
channel.description: As the title said, Heroes makes my CPU usage go up to 95-100%, and I have no idea why, I have a CPU that beats the recommended requirements, so that can't be it. I tried low and high graphic settings and it uses 95-100% on both settings. Any idea what's the problem?

item.title: Heroes of Might and Magic VI eats my CPU
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
that its odd on deed, I know it´s cliché, but check you have the latest graphics drivers as its common to include fixes for x games in such patches if it has to do with graphics. Also, if it doesnt help, since no other game or software gives you that issue, try e-mailing the devs, maybe they know about this problem and have a workaround in the official forums or what not

Read full topic
item.source: Heroes of Might and Magic VI eats my CPU

item.title: Heroes of Might and Magic VI eats my CPU
item.dc:creator: Aze
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

…maybe the game is using your CPU. Games tend to do that.

no shit… I meant that 100% is abnormal, none of the other games, not even the games with better graph use that much.

Luciel:

does the game run ok though?

Nope, that’s why I created the topic, it sometimes stops for a second and “lags” or I don’ know how to say it, it’s fractured (I don’t know the right word sorry). As I said even on low and on high graph settings, so it’s not that my pc doesnt meet the req.

Read full topic
item.source: Heroes of Might and Magic VI eats my CPU
